snippet.title: Sol Engine: Sonic vs Darkness (Sonic Fan Game)
snippet.description:
READ THE DESCRIPTION


Here's a look at how the remake of Sonic vs Darkness will be in the future. The fan game is called "Sonic vs Darkness: True Nightmare Revived". Sonic vs Darkness is my very first Sonic Fan Game, which came right before Salom Adventure.

Sadly this was not able to be finished in time for SAGE this act. But honestly at this state I would still not release it yet. Though I do hope you enjoy what I have so far in the project.

I'd also like to thank Goncas for sharing me his monitor icon sprites. Check him out on DeviantArt here, it'll be worth your time: http://goncas23.deviantart.com/

DOWNLOAD LINK IS ON THE PAGE:
http://nefault1st.wordpress.com/downloads/sonic-vs-darkness-true-nightmare-revived/
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DISCLAIMER: This is a non-profit fan-made project titled "Sonic vs Darkness - True Nightmare Revived". This project and it's developers are in no way affiliated with SEGA® or Sonic Team™. All registered trademarks and copyrights of "Sonic the Hedgehog" belong to SEGA®. All other trademarks belong to their respective owners.
